words.ex: No one could gainsay the overwhelming evidence.
The crisis galvanized the community into action.
His bold gambit caught the negotiators off guard.
The room was decorated in garish colors that clashed horribly.
The normally garrulous host fell unusually silent.
He tried to gaslight her into doubting her own memory.
His gauche remarks ruined the otherwise pleasant dinner.
Her comments were not germane to the topic at hand.
The idea gestated for years before becoming a full project.
They were confronted with a ghastly scene of destruction.
He ignored the gibes from his critics.
She felt giddy with excitement after the announcement.
He lifted the fragile box gingerly.
Progress on the reforms proceeded at a glacial pace.
His glib assurances failed to convince anyone.
She glowered at him from across the table.
A glut of cheap imports flooded the market.
The hikers rested beneath a gnarled old tree.
He couldn’t shake the gnawing feeling that something was wrong.
They goaded him into responding angrily.
She wore a gossamer shawl that shimmered in the light.
The chef’s menu delighted even the most demanding gourmands.
His grandiloquent speech amused rather than impressed.
The committee rejected the grandiose proposal as unrealistic.
The film was criticized for its gratuitous violence.
He was known as a gregarious and approachable leader.
They suffered a grievous loss that shook the entire family.
The daily grind left him exhausted but determined.
The documentary showed grisly scenes from the disaster.
The sculpture had a strangely grotesque charm.
He groused about the new policy all afternoon.
He refused to grovel for forgiveness.
The team completed a grueling 14‑hour shift.
She navigated the negotiations with a mix of charm and guile.
Scammers prey on gullible victims.
It took real gumption to challenge the status quo.
